What I nice surprise, best movie I have seen i a long time. I highly recommend it!

I liked this movie! thanks to the release group..
It gave me a bit of insight to the life of an alcoholic, and how that lifestyle erodes one's moral compass to the point that they become such a monster.
Apparently, > 50% of murders are committed by people when they are drunk. Alcohol is a major social problem, but its legal.. go figure.
Anyway, intense movie.. watch it whilst u get sloshed!

Thanks, FxM - You're gone but not forgotten. Never did see this one, but it made Ebert's top 10 independent films list for 2009, so i figure it's worth checking out.

Good quality up: 10/10. Eng subtitles i linked to are solid as well.

The movie? Very well done, but pretty depressing. 

Plus....and i don't THINK this requires a spoiler warning....It's one of those 'choose your own ending' kinda flicks, where they don't give you a clear conclusion. Did X happen? Did Y happen? It's left up to the viewer to decide (i hate that kinda thing, myself).
